tool.name: CMsearch deoverlap
tool.description: removes lower scoring overlaps from cmsearch results
tool.command: ln -s '$clan_information' clan_info && ln -s '$cmsearch_matches' cmsearch_matches && LC_ALL=C perl '$__tool_directory__/cmsearch-deoverlap.pl' --clanin clan_info cmsearch_matches #if $maxkeep: $maxkeep #end if #if $dirty: $dirty && mv *.sort '$matches_sort' #end if && mv *.deoverlapped '$deoverlapped_matches'

param.name: clan_information
param.label: Clan information
param.help: Each row in the file contains an RNA clan and its corresponding family members

param.name: cmsearch_matches
param.label: The tabular result file from cmsearch
Keep hits that only overlap with other hits that are not kept
param.help: If this option is not set, all hits with higher scoring overlap will be removed.

param.label: Keep the intermediate sorted tblout file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
This tool removes lower-scoring overlaps from cmsearch results. Given information about the clans and the cmsearch tbl output this tool returns a filtered cmsearch tbl output.
